page.title: 18A TYPICAL SATURDAY
page.content: On Saturday at 7 o'clock my alarm clock wakes me. I wake my two brothers and have a cup of tea made by the tea- maker. I get milk from the refrigera- tor. Then I get dressed, go downstairs and take out a bowl and spoon from the dish-washer. I get Shreddies(a cereal) from the cupboard. I put two pieces of bread in the toaster. After breakfast we go and feed the ducks and chickens. Then we collect the eggs. Afterwards we watch televis- ion on one of four channels. I go out- side and ride my bike which is a BMX. At about 1 o'clock we have dinner consisting of chicken, peas, carrots, potatoes and cabbage. We have damsons and cream for dessert. After dinner we watch a film on the video. Then we garden. We eat bread and jam and cake for tea. Then we watch television and go to bed.
